title: 2017年大埔廚工襲擊環保署職員罪成案 終院指出吳重儀審訊過程可能存有重大不公平 批出上訴許可

replies.msg:
Appeal Committee:

1. We are satisfied that it is reasonably arguable that there has been a substantial and grave injustice in that the conduct of the trial and the treatment of the evidence may have miscarried so that the defendant was denied a fair trial. We grant leave accordingly.

2. The appeal will be listed for hearing on 4 January 2021.





(R A V Ribeiro) (Joseph Fok) (Andrew Cheung)
Permanent Judge Permanent Judge Permanent Judge


Mr Eric TM Cheung, Solicitor Advocate and Mr Carter Chim, instructed by ONC Lawyers on a pro bono basis, for the Applicant

Mr Derek Lau, SPP, of the Department of Justice, for the Respondent

https://legalref.judiciary.hk/lrs/common/ju/ju_frame.jsp?DIS=129268&currpage=T
